frs.broker.ipc.socket

Class SocketClientRequestHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • frs.broker.ipc.socket.SocketClientRequestHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientRequestHandler

    public class SocketClientRequestHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientRequestHandler
    Implementation of the Client Request Handler using simple sockets. As in HTTP protocol 1.0 days, the socket is opened and closed on every call.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SocketClientRequestHandler(java.lang.String hostname, int port) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReplyObject sendToServer(RequestObject requestObject)
      Send a request, defined by an operation name and a payload (in the chosen marshaling format), to the server's server request handler; await an answer and return a valid reply object.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • sendToServer

        public ReplyObject sendToServer(RequestObject requestObject)
        Description copied from interface: ClientRequestHandler
        Send a request, defined by an operation name and a payload (in the chosen marshaling format), to the server's server request handler; await an answer and return a valid reply object. The objectId can be interpreted in a broad sense (not necessarily as the id of 'obj' in 'obj.operation(params)'), depending upon the invoker at the server side.
        Specified by:
        sendToServer in interface ClientRequestHandler
        Parameters:
        requestObject - the request to send
        Returns:
        a reply from the remote component
